doc.title: Hong Kong Street Chun Kee: Is there milk in the soup?
doc.text: Everytime/WP I/PRP eat/VBP this/DT type/NN of/IN fish/NN soup/NN ,/, I/PRP have/VB 2/CD questions/NNS ./. The/DT first/JJ is/VBZ ,/, ''/NNP ''/. The/DT second/NN is/VBZ ,/, ''/NNP ''/NNP -LRB-/NNP Ok/NNP ,/, that/WDT was/VBD 4/CD questions/NN -RRB-/. So/CC this/DT is/VBZ one/CD of/IN those/DT serendipidous/JJ blogs/NNS which/WRB I/PRP hope/VB will/VB elicit/VB a/DT ''/JJ ''/NN -LRB-/NN Eureka/NN !/. -RRB-/RB Would/MD it/PRP surprise/VBZ you/PRP if/IN I/PRP told/VBD you/PRP that/WDT you/PRP do/VBP n't/RB need/VB milk/NN to/TO make/VB the/DT fish/NN soup/NN white/JJ ?/. It/PRP certainly/RB surprised/VBD me/PRP !/. For/IN many/JJ years/NNS ,/, ``/JJ people/NN ''/NNS have/VBP told/VBN me/PRP that/WDT milk/PRP was/VBD added/VBD to/TO the/DT fish/NN soup/NN to/TO make/VB it/PRP white/JJ ,/, and/CC I/PRP always/RB assumed/VBD that/IN this/DT was/VBD so/RB ./. Imagine/IN my/PRP$ surprise/NN when/WRB the/DT Uncle/NN explained/NN to/TO me/PRP that/IN they/PRP do/VBP n't/RB put/VB milk/NN in/IN the/DT fish/NN soup/NN !/. The/DT first/JJ step/NN in/IN the/DT fish/NN soup/NN receipe/NN is/VBZ to/TO deep/VB fry/VB the/DT sliced/VBN Toman/NN fish/NN ./. Once/RB it/PRP is/VBZ browned/JJ and/CC the/DT oil/NN has/VBZ absorbed/IN the/DT fishy/JJ flavor/NN ,/, most/NN of/IN the/DT oil/NN is/VBZ decanted/JJ ,/, leaving/VBG just/RB enough/JJ to/TO mix/VB with/IN the/DT soup/NN stock/NN ./. I/PRP thought/VBD it/PRP was/VBD supposed/VBN to/TO be/VB some/DT really/RB thick/JJ fish/NN stock/NN but/CC was/VBD very/RB surprised/VBD that/IN it/PRP was/VBD a/DT simple/JJ ginger/NN stock/NN !/. -LRB-/JJ At/IN this/DT point/NN I/PRP was/VBD in/IN a/DT state/NN of/IN disbelief/NN -RRB-/. Next/CC ,/, the/DT lid/NN is/VBZ put/VB on/IN the/DT wok/NN and/CC high/JJ heat/NN is/VBZ applied/JJ until/IN white/JJ smoke/NNS start/VB streaming/RB from/IN the/DT edges/NN ./. The/DT ginger/NN stock/NN is/VBZ then/RB poured/JJ over/IN the/DT lid/NN slowly/NN ./. The/DT combination/NN of/IN the/DT high/JJ heat/NN ,/, stock/NN and/CC oil/NN enables/IN the/DT oil/NN and/CC water/NN to/TO combined/VB together/RB into/IN an/DT emulsion/NN !/. It/PRP takes/VBZ almost/RB 5/CD to/TO 10/CD minutes/NN to/TO make/VB one/CD bowl/NN of/IN fish/NN soup/NN !/. And/CC because/IN every/DT bowl/NN is/VBZ made/VBD separately/NN ,/, you/PRP ca/MD n't/RB really/RB ask/VB for/IN more/NN soup/NN without/IN having/VBG to/TO wait/VB ./. After/IN the/DT soup/NN has/VBZ turned/VBD into/IN a/DT milky/JJ white/JJ color/NN ,/, some/NN condiments/NNS are/VBP added/VBD ./. The/DT last/JJ step/NN is/VBZ the/DT addition/NN of/IN Chinese/NNP rice/NN wine/NN just/RB before/IN serving/VBG ./. As/IN you/PRP know/VBP ,/, some/DT other/JJ stalls/NNS have/VBP substituted/VBN Chinese/NNP rice/NN wine/NN with/IN XO/NN ./. According/VBG to/TO the/DT Uncle/NN ,/, they/PRP were/VBD the/DT first/JJ stall/NN to/TO introduce/VB this/DT dish/NN which/WDT has/VBZ become/VBN quite/RB popular/JJ in/IN many/JJ Cze/NNP Char/NNP stalls/NNS ./. It/PRP was/VBD tasty/JJ ,/, but/CC I/PRP found/VBD the/DT pork/NN ribs/NNS to/TO be/VB really/RB small/JJ and/CC emaciated/JJ ./. $/$ 8/CD If/IN this/PRP had/VBD been/VBN just/RB called/VBD Deep/NNP Fried/NNP Chicken/NNP Wings/NNP ,/, I/PRP would/MD have/VB given/VBN it/PRP a/DT high/JJ mark/NN !/. However/RB ,/, being/VBG Prawn/NNP Paste/NNP Chicken/NN ,/, I/PRP have/VBN to/TO say/VB that/IN the/DT prawn/NN paste/NN taste/NN did/VBD not/RB really/RB come/VB through/IN ./. The/DT chicken/NN flesh/NN also/RB lacked/VBZ the/DT red/JJ coloring/NN which/WDT would/MD indicate/VB that/IN the/DT meat/NN was/VBD marinated/VBD long/RB enough/JJ ./. Both/NNP Kway/NNP Teow/NNP and/CC Sliced/NNP Fish/NNP were/VBD very/RB fresh/JJ !/. $/$ 8/CD According/VBG to/TO this/DT uncle/NN ,/, his/PRP mother/NN was/VBD the/DT one/CD who/WP originally/VBZ ran/IN the/DT stall/NN at/IN Hong/NNP Kong/NNP Street/NNP ./. They/PRP then/RB moved/VBD to/TO Commonwealth/VB Ave/NN and/CC in/IN 1997/NN ,/, following/NN a/DT newspaper/JJ article/NN on/IN their/PRP$ Fish/NN Soup/NN ,/, the/DT business/NN started/VBD to/TO boom/VB ./. This/DT then/RB gave/VBD rise/NN to/TO many/JJ of/IN his/PRP$ chefs/NN leaving/VBG to/TO start/VB their/PRP$ own/JJ ``/NNP Hong/NNP Kong/NNP Street/NNP ''/NNP restaurants/NN ./.
